content: små muscher höger och vänster socka kommer att se olika ut men matcha och komplettera varandra ytmönstren presenteras i diagram konstruktionen är klassisk uppifrån-och-ner med hälkappa *** some words from previous knitters thank you anitayarn for this beautiful and interesting pattern hibiscus *the most challenging project i can remember learned a lot from working it * thank you for designing a work of art that was a joy to knit *just finished the socks this pattern was super fun and they fit well thank you for this great pattern anita * absolutely love the pattern the result is a work of art and the knitting process is very enjoyable - thank you anita *this is such an interesting pattern lots of fun thank you * yes i did it little bit proud of myself a big compliment to the designer for this unique pattern *what a fun pattern * finished my old vine socks thank you very much for such a beautiful and challenging pattern *i can t imagine what it took to create this fascinating pattern * 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/sock-knitters-anonymous s=tab 2 https //www ravelry com/groups/sock-knitters-anonymous s=tab 3 https //www ravelry com/groups/anitayarns-knitting-lounge s=tab
